column4: besides using 'brightside', is there a way to enable edge flipping on the gnome desktop (ubuntu 9.10)?
how can i configure the gdm login screen (change theme) in 9.10?
short answer. you dont. :) its a lot less configurable then the old. You can change the wallpaper easially.
theres also a few other tweaks you can do to it at this time.  but its  not near as themeable as the old.
that was exactly my impression after doing the upgrade today. why do they deprecate important features. i want my old login screen back!

becuse they are working on adding new features to gdm and other areas. so eventually it will be better.
if its that critical you can install the old gdm. but i dont advise it
